Title: Falafel Wrap
Description: Crispy homemade falafel balls wrapped in a soft flatbread with veggies and tahini sauce.
Instructions: Blend chickpeas, garlic, and parsley into a coarse mixture and form into balls.
Fry balls until golden and crispy.
Spread tahini on flatbread, add falafel, fresh vegetables, drizzle with lemon juice, and wrap.

Title: Banh Mi
Description: Vietnamese sandwich filled with savory ingredients like pork, pickled vegetables, and spicy condiments.
Instructions: Slice baguette lengthwise and spread mayonnaise and Sriracha.
Layer cooked pork, pickled daikon, carrot, and top with cilantro.
Close sandwich and serve.

Title: Creamy Mushroom Risotto
Description: Rich and creamy risotto cooked slowly with fresh mushrooms, Parmesan cheese, and white wine.
Instructions: Saut√© onions and mushrooms in butter until soft.
Add rice and toast lightly before deglazing with white wine.
Gradually add chicken broth, stirring constantly until rice is creamy and al dente.
Stir in Parmesan cheese and serve.

Title: Thai Green Curry
Description: Spicy and aromatic Thai green curry with chicken, bamboo shoots, and basil.
Instructions: Brown chicken thighs and set aside.
Fry green curry paste until aromatic, then add coconut milk and bring to a simmer.
Add chicken, bamboo shoots, and simmer until cooked.
Finish with basil leaves and fish sauce before serving with steamed rice.

Title: Lamb Rogan Josh
Description: Aromatic Kashmiri dish known for its tender lamb and vibrant spices.
Instructions: Marinate the lamb in yogurt and spices overnight.
Brown the lamb in a hot pan, then add ginger and garlic.
Add tomato puree and simmer until the lamb is tender.
Serve with naan or rice.

Title: Pan-Seared Salmon with Dill Sauce
Description: Perfectly seared salmon fillets served with a creamy dill sauce.
Instructions: Season salmon with salt and pepper, sear in a hot skillet.
Mix sour cream, dill, and lemon juice to make the sauce.
Serve salmon with sauce and a side of steamed vegetables.

Title: Avocado Toast with Poached Egg
Description: Creamy avocado spread on toasted artisan bread topped with a perfectly poached egg.
Instructions: Toast the bread slices to desired crispness.
Mash the avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Poach eggs to desired doneness.
Assemble by spreading avocado on toast, topping with poached egg and a sprinkle of red pepper flakes.

Title: Chocolate Lava Cake
Description: Decadent chocolate cakes with a molten chocolate center, served warm.
Instructions: Melt chocolate and butter together.
Whisk in sugar and eggs until smooth.
Fold in flour, pour into ramekins, and bake until edges are firm but center is runny.
Serve immediately with vanilla ice cream.
